title: Enhanced archive skill with cleanup option
description: Upgrade the archive skill from simple knowledge to a proper skill with bash functions. Archives to docs.local/prd-archive/ (preserves full history). After archiving, ask if user wants to reset the working PRD for a fresh start. If yes: delete completed story files from prd-json/stories/, reset index.json stats. History always preserved in docs.local.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Convert archive.md to progressive disclosure structure (SKILL.md + workflows/)
Create workflows/archive-snapshot.md for creating timestamped archive
Create workflows/cleanup-completed.md for removing completed stories
Interactive: gum confirm 'Reset PRD for fresh start?'
If yes: delete all story files where passes=true
If yes: reset index.json stats (completed=0, recalculate total)
If yes: rebuild pending array from remaining stories
Create new empty progress.txt after cleanup
Add --keep flag to skip cleanup prompt
Add --clean flag to auto-cleanup without prompt
Update tests in test-ralph.zsh for archive functions
